Welcome AGMP Study staff, coordinators, and PI's.

This section encompasses study specific tools and videos for your reference. If you have any questions, comments, or new ideas please contact NCRAD by email or phone (800) 526-2839 or directly at (317) 278-1170.

Please follow the below link to access the Kit Request Module. This link will direct you to a REDCap database where study coordinators and staff may request individual kit numbers for stool and capillary blood kits. Please allow a total of two weeks for kit requests to be compiled and delivered to your site.
